column4: What is the best remote desktop software I can get hold of for Linux?
I am using GRDesktop, but this is quite laggy
Could some people let me know what they use as remote desktop clients on Ubuntu...I am using grdesktop, but it can be quite laggy
run rdesktop from the command line
if you want remote desktop that is
Install openssh on windows xp and run rdesktop through an ssh tunnel...much more secure
